prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Guitar, Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Brass, Guitar, Drums, Synth Lead, and Piano, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Guitar, Drums, Synth Lead, and Piano, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Brass, Guitar, Drums, Synth Lead, Piano, Bass absent.
